ygData.subject: RE: Teleporting mobs - anyone see this yet?
ygData.msgSnippet: ya its painfull... group: Minkin go get a giant... me: sure.. roam around abit find one annoy it and run back to group Hmm where he go 200 damage later he s
ygData.messageBody:
ya its painfull...

group: Minkin go get a giant...
me: sure..
roam around abit find one annoy it and run back to group
Hmm where he go
200 damage later he's showing you his underfoot

Minkin
Sol Ro
Flat from big foot extraordinaire

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jhenders@... [SMTP:jhenders@...]
> Sent: September 10, 1999 3:18 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Teleporting mobs - anyone see this yet?
>
> From: jhenders@...
>
>
>
> I just read on Stratics that they have added the code they had on test
> server that causes mobs who can't reach you due to pathing problems to
> be able to teleport to you. However, the article on Stratics said it
> happened to a party in lower guk, where a group of mobs teleported into
> a room with one. As our AE songs are likely to set off mobs in other
> parts of the dungeon more than anything anyone else can do, I was
> wondering if anyone has seen mobs mysteriously teleport into a fight
> anywhere yet.
>
>
